subject: Testing XML-RPC and SOAP server responses
msgSnippet: Hi All, Iam a newbie to JUnit.I want to test my SOAP and XML-RPC server responses using JUnit.Can anybody let me know more about how to do this. Many Thanks
messageBody:
Hi All,
Iam a newbie to JUnit.I want to test my SOAP and XML-RPC server
responses using JUnit.Can anybody let me know more about how to do
this.

Many Thanks
Prashanth
